content: **knitted socks for children in drops nord the piece is worked top down sizes 24 - 43 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #wisteriawishsocks drops design pattern no-002-bn yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** shoe-size 24/25 - 26/28 - 29/31 - 32/34 - 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length 15-17-18-20-22-24-27 cm leg-length to heel approx 6-7-7-8-8-9-10 cm **yarn** drops nord from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50-50-100-100-100 g colour 25 sweet orchid **needles** drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 28 stitches in width and 38 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
